Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: We achieved this by running "cAdvisor" container inside local_fabric.sh script. Will work on adding same script to run cAdvisor container from ansible.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: No more effort is being spent on v0.6 workitems. Someone can open a new jira task if they wish to explore using this tool in v1.0 and share how to use it.
